dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3260 IH: Northern Mariana Islands Medicaid Equivalence Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sablan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XI of the Social Security Act to increase the payment limit under Medicaid for the Northern Mariana Islands.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Northern Mariana Islands Medicaid Equivalence Act.

section.header: Increasing payment limit under Medicaid for the Northern Mariana Islands
section.text: Section 1108(g)(2)(D) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1308(g)(2)(D)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in clause (i), by striking clause (ii) and inserting clauses (ii) through (iv);
in clause (ii), by striking and at the end; and
by adding at the end the following new clause:

clause.text: for fiscal year 2024, the amount determined under subparagraph (E) with respect to American Samoa for such fiscal year; and
